name: Aerann sprl
goal: Provide EU representation services to clients, primarily in legal field. Monitoring and lobbying services, including organising and attending meetings with EU officials and attending conferences, hearings, workshops etc organised by, or involving, the EU institutions.  Also liaison and cooperation with other stakeholders.
interests: Borders and Security, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Justice and home affairs, digital Single market and other single market initiatives; free movement of services, etc
customers: General Council of the Bar of England & Wales
